extensionDescription.message: Readds Google Maps link to the search page and makes map thumbnail clickable.

option_enableActionButton_label.message: Add "Open in Maps" button next to the action bar

option_enableLocalActionTile_label.message: Add "Open in Maps" tile in the local actions row

option_enableMapsTab_label.message: Add 'Maps' tab to the top navigation

aboutText1.message: Open-source extension that brings back the Google Maps tab/button on the search page and makes the small map thumbnail clickable.

aboutText2.message: Source code and issue tracking are available on GitHub. Contributions are welcome.

operaNote.message: For OPERA users: You need to go to your extension settings in Opera, find this extension and tick the "Allow access to search page results" then refresh the page.
